frontmatter.description: In this lesson you will be introduced to the most basic array method which iterates over an entire list - `forEach`. By the end of the lesson, you should be comfortable with thinking about writing methods which operate on an entire list of items, one item at a time.
frontmatter.title: forEach()

readingLinks.description: MDN is our go-to resource for learning the API of forEach.
readingLinks.title: The MDN docs on forEach

readingLinks.description: Clear, vanilla implementations of forEach and other new array methods to help you understand what's happening when you use them.
readingLinks.title: Clear descriptions of JS array methods.

readingLinks.description: A deep dive on forEach and some of it's predecessors.
readingLinks.title: forEach deep dive
